column3:
Once upon a time there was a cute brown puppy. He was a very happy puppy. His name was
ewlineRudy. Rudy had a best friend. His name was Thomas. Thomas had a nice dad named
ewlineRick. Thomas and Rudy had been friends for almost a year. Rudy and Thomas loved to play in
ewlinethe big back yard. Sometimes, Thomas would ask his friend Jacob to come to the back yard
ewlineand play with them. Jacob would always bring his puppy too. Jacob's puppy was named
ewlineSally. Thomas and  Jacob would run around the back yard and Rudy and Sally chased them and
ewlinebarked. They all had so much fun playing together. One day, Thomas told Rudy that tomorrow
ewlinewould be a very special day. It would be Rudy's birthday. Rudy was very excited. The next
ewlineday came and Thomas threw a birthday party for Rudy. All of Rudy's friends were there and
ewlinethey had presents for him. Jacob brought Rudy a new ball and Sally brought him a
ewlinebone. There was one more present for Rudy to open. When he opened the gift from Thomas,
ewlineRudy was so exited that he jumped and barked. It was a new red collar with a shiny name
ewlinetag on it. It was the best gift Rudy had ever been given.
column4: one: What color was the cute puppy?
column9: multiple: What was the best gift Rudy had ever been given?
column10: a red collar with a name tag
column14: one: Where did Rudy and Thomas love to play?
column19: multiple: What was the name of Rudy's best friend?
